questions.content: The new beverage from the Elmhurst Corporation can be described_______a nutritional energy drink.
The upfront investment in the manufacturing sector will _______result in the creation ofhundreds of jobs.
The office manager hoped to_______ the changes to the dress code policy at the meeting.
The noise from the construction equipment outside of Mr. Polanco's office made it difficultto_______
Due to the very competitive nature of the field, the managers are seeking new and unique_______to reaching customers.
After receiving_______ complaints about the device overheating, Wayvon Electronics recalled its new smartphone.
The originality of Ms. Lanham's entry could not be denied,_______ she did not make it to the final round of the art competition.
Staff members at this company are expected to give as much notice as possible whenever_______ need time off work for a vacation.
After reviewing the two submitted bids, council members selected the more_______ option because of the company's reputation for reliability.
The physician explained that a feeling of dizziness_______ accompanies increased thirst when a patient has not drunk enough water.
The emphasis placed _______teamwork helps Espinoza International's employees feel supported.
For safety reasons, all employees and customers must _______ the building when the fire alarm sounds.
Those who are familiar with the jazz trio's first album may find its latest release to be_______ similar.
Analysts predict that Bolman Automotive will have a _______ for its hybrid vehicles for at leastthe next few years.
Ms. Jang was offered a promotion after handling the emergency procedures during the power outage_______
The annual community softball tournament welcomes teams of all ages and _______ abilities.
Owing to the package's_______contents, the courier was instructed not to stack anything heavy on top of it.
Once the sales personnel were informed that the product launch exceeded projections, they realized they had been _______worried.
All massage therapists working at the Sunset Spa are required to have valid state _______as well as three years of experience.
Surprisingly, Mr. Saraf can _______ arrive faster by train because traveling by air requires a long security procedure.
The jet ski is unlikely to flip over when in operation, but users must nonetheless takethe necessary______
Most tenants agree that the landlord made the right decision______ the addition of motion-sensor lights near the side entrances.
The creators of the product claim that if you spray it evenly on carpeting or curtains, any odor ______ within a few minutes.
PG Internet was able to expand its network exponentially thanks to a number of important______in technology.
Local art enthusiasts were delighted at the news that the museum procured a rare painting______to be worth over two million euros.
Officials are taking extraordinary measures to prevent some people from putting more______ currency into circulation.
Consumers were encouraged to return all battery packs to the manufacturer during its recall, however______ they may be.
The general consensus is that too much television near bedtime is bad for one's health, but Dr. Iversen set out to prove______
Because she enjoys learning about other cultures, Ms. Fernandez prefers to take vacations overseas______ stay closer to home.
Thanks to their beautiful illustrations and charming storylines, Alice Boyd's children's books have been______ popular.
